## About

I am Sandra Tamakloe, a graduate student passionate about the connection between Economics and Business. Currently a graduate assistant at Memorial University's Department of Economics, I focus on the captivating fields of Labour Economics, Health Economics, Data Analytics, and Business Analytics. I aim to utilize data to tell compelling stories that bridge the analytical depth of economics with strategic business insights.
